column4: Hey, peeps! I've got a vga connected form my netbook to my hdtv using a vga cord. It's showing, but the aspect ratio is 4:3. Any ideas as to how to get it to 16:9?
Adjust the monitor settings.  On my netbook it defaults to mirrored as well.  Just tell it it's a second monitor, and choose the right one from the drop-down.
Do you see a checkbox that says "Same image in all monitors"?
